messages.title: Welsh Labour's five pledges to you

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect living standards and create better jobs closer to home
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Welsh Labour pledges to protect living standards and aim to create better job opportunities closer to where people live.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Defend our NHS and protect social care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Welsh Labour commits to defending the National Health Service and ensuring the protection of social care services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give all children a chance to achieve
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Welsh Labour intends to provide all children with the opportunities they need to succeed and achieve their potential.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More bobbies on the beat to make our neighbourhoods safer
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Welsh Labour promises to increase the presence of police officers on the streets to enhance safety in local communities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Provide more affordable homes to rent and buy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Welsh Labour aims to supply more affordable housing options for individuals looking to rent or purchase homes.

housing.content: Provide more affordable homes to rent and buy

contactInformation.address: Lousie Magee, General Secretary, Welsh Labour on behalf of Welsh Labour, both at 1 Cathedral Road, Cardiff CF11 9HA

images.caption: Image of the candidate with the text Welsh Labour five pledges to the side.
